name: Revolution (itch) (MyQly)
description:
This is a submission for KenneyJam 2021.

The game is Revolution, an arcade space shooter where your objective is to protect the station and as many satellites as possible for a full minute.

If all satellites are lost or the station is hit 3 times the game is over and you fail.

Exports are included for Windows & Linux. Source is likewise released with a do what you want with it license. It's the gummiest spaghetti.
